ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
A cynical look at justice, relationships, reversals, planning ahead, education, therapy, weapons, priorities, lawyers, gardening, air travel, the office, truth, and doctors.

ComicInfo.Title: A.I. Absolute Idiocy; Lunch-Packing Mom Profiles; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; The Lighter Side of...; Student Excuse Notes for the 21st Century; A Mad Look at Priests, Ministers, Rabbis & a Few Scoundrels; When Corporate Sponsorship of Schools Goes Too Far!; A Man’s Guide to How Long Before You’ll “Get Any” After Committing One of These Common Relationship Errors; 10 Signs That Your Neighborhood Gang is Getting Old; Monroe and… the Great American Road Trip Part Two; 6 Degrees of Separation Between Anyone and Anything Part VI; The Simpsons By the Numbers; Only a True PETA Nut…; Lotta Crotch: Bazoom Raider
